params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the policy to retrieve. Format: policies/{attachment_point}/denypolicies/{policy_id} Use the URL-encoded full resource name, which means that the forward-slash character, /, must be written as %2F. For example, policies/cloudresourcemanager.googleapis.com%2Fprojects%2Fmy-project/denypolicies/my-policy. For organizations and folders, use the numeric ID in the full resource name. For projects, you can use the alphanumeric or the numeric ID.

methods.name: getName
methods.description:
Required. The resource name of the policy to retrieve. Format: policies/{attachment_point}/denypolicies/{policy_id} Use the URL-encoded full resource name, which means that the forward-slash character, /, must be written as %2F. For example, policies/cloudresourcemanager.googleapis.com%2Fprojects%2Fmy-project/denypolicies/my-policy.

For organizations and folders, use the numeric ID in the full resource name. For projects, you can use the alphanumeric or the numeric ID.

Generated from protobuf field string name = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
